home.banner: “We come from the market with a clear vision of what companies really need to be #1... in the market.”

execSearch.title: Executive Search
execSearch.slug: Our Executive Search solution uses a complete set of tools to provide our Clients with the right Executive at the right time and with the mindset needed to perfectly fit into their new role

targetedSearch.title: Targeted Search
targetedSearch.slug: Our Targeted Search solution is a simplified path to selecting the right Executive: faster and direct, allows our Clients to fill their Leadership positions from within a reduced but well suited comparable Candidate base

leadership.title: Leadership Assessment
leadership.slug:
Our Leadership Assessment solution combines three distinctive differentiators:

  • EBS-Executive Business Simulation: designed to expose Candidates to short and long term critical decision making
  • The LAB- Leadership Assessment Board: Leadership ‘straight talk’ with experienced top HR Executives and CEOs
  • Comparable and easy to read Individual Scorecard

Our Leadership Assessment is an agile and smart way to decide between internal and external Candidates as well as validating potential internal promotions

groupSimulation.title: Group Simulations
groupSimulation.slug:
Our Group Simulations are challenging sessions for Management Board/Leadership Team members to interact either live or virtually with their peers

A "hands on way" to sharpen decision making skills and fuel constructive discussions as well as an idea generation forum

The participants may work individually or into cleverly designed teams aimed at fueling collaboration and integration

howEBSworks.slug:
Under our simulation setting the individual is challenged for 3.5 hours and 4 years of virtually leading an organization

The Leader takes several decisions on sales & marketing, investments, operations, talent and many other that impact an array of indicators which eventually are reflected in an comprehensive but easy to read comparable individual Scorecard

whyEBS.slug:
Executive Business Simulation is a powerful tool that inmerses the person into a situation that truly resembles real life decision making

It is a practical and direct way of identifying exceptional Leaders who will Redefine Performance

An airliner pilot goes through a flight simulation every 6 months on average… why shouldn’t a top Executive? No business year nor market conditions are the same. Hundreds of careers depend upon their decisions. Similarly no flight conditions are alike and the pilot must have the sharpest SA (Situational Awareness) prior, during and after every flight... the safety of every passenger is at stake

ourSIM.slug:
Under our EBS setting the following skills and capabilities are practiced by the individual:

  • Contextual Vision
  • Judgement
  • Global perspective
  • Adaptability
  • Complexity management
  • Risk taking
  • Shaping strategy
  • Technology understanding
  • Financial sharpness
  • Talent Insights

And additionally in group simulations:

  • Critical thinking
  • Collaboration
  • Influencing & negotiation
  • Cross functional interactions
